name: Ahmed Ali
text: TA SIN MIM.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: These are the verses of the perspicuous Book.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You may perhaps wear out your heart because they do not come to belief.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We could send down from the heavens a sign to them if We pleased, before which their heads would remain bowed.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Never does a new reminder come to them from Ar-Rahman but they turn away from it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Surely they have done with denying; soon will come to them the news of what they were laughing at.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do they not see the earth, how We grow all kinds of noble things upon it?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily there are signs in this; yet many of them do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Your Lord is surely mighty and merciful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When your Lord called upon Moses: "Go to the wicked people,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear and take heed?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: : He said: "O Lord, I fear that they will deny me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: My heart is constrained, my tongue falters, so delegate Aaron;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And they have a charge (of murder) against me. So I fear that they will kill me."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (It was) said: "By no means. Go with My signs, both of you. I am verily with you and I hear.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Go to the Pharaoh and tell him: 'We bring a message from the Lord of all the worlds

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That you should send the children of Israel with us.'

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The Pharaoh) said: "Did we not bring you up as a child? And you lived a number of years of your life with us.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And you commited what you did, and you are ungrateful!"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Moses) replied: "I did do that and I was in the wrong,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So I ran away from you out of fear. But my Lord has given me wisdom, and made me an apostle.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But the favour you oblige me with is that you have enslaved the children of Israel."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The Pharaoh asked: "And what is the Lord of all the worlds?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Moses) said: "The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, if you can believe."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The Pharaoh) said to those around him: "Do you hear?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Moses continued): "Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers before you."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The Pharaoh) said (to his nobles): "Your apostle who has been sent to you, is certainly mad."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Moses) said: "The Lord of the East and the Lord of the West and all that lies between them, if you have sense."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The Pharaoh) said: "If you took another god apart from me I will have you incarcerated."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Moses) said: "Even though I have brought to you something convincing?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (The Pharaoh) said: "Then bring it, if you speak the truth."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So (Moses) cast his staff, and lo, it turned into a living serpent.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And he drew forth his hand, and lo, it looked white to the beholders.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him: "He is certainly a clever magician.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic. So, what do you bid?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "Put him and his brother off awhile, and send summoners to the cities to gather

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And bring the ablest magicians to you."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So the magicians were assembled at a stated time and place on an appointed day.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And the people were also asked to assemble.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (They said): "We may haply follow the magicians if they are victorious."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When the magicians arrived, they said to the Pharaoh: "Is there a reward for us if we are victorious?" --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Yes," he replied. "You 'will be among the honoured."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Moses said to them: "Cast what you have to cast."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So they cast their ropes and rods, and said: "By the glory of Pharaoh, we shall be victorious."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then Moses threw down his staff, and lo, it swallowed up their conjurations.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then the magicians fell prostrating in adoration,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And said: "We (affirm and) believe in the Lord of all the worlds,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Said (the Pharaoh): "You have come to believe in him before I gave you leave. He is surely your chief, who taught you magic. You will soon come to know: I will have your hands and feet cut off on alternate sides, and have every one of you crucified."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "There will be no harm. We shall return to our Lord.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We certainly hope our Lord will forgive our sins as we are the first to believe."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We said to Moses: "Travel by night with My creatures. You will surely be pursued."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then the Pharaoh sent announcers to the cities,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Proclaiming): "Surely they are a small band (of fugitives).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They are always harassing us.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But we are a fully accounted army."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We made them leave the gardens and springs of water,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And treasures and agreeable mansions.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Thus it was; and We made the children of Israel possess them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But they pursued them at sunrise.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When the two forces drew within seeing distance of each other, the people of Moses said: "We shall certainly be overtaken."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Moses replied: "By no means. My Lord is with me. He will show me the way."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We commanded Moses: "Smite the sea with your staff." And it parted, and every parting was like a lofty mountain.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then We brought the others to that place.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We delivered Moses and every one with him,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And We drowned the others.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Indeed your Lord is mighty and merciful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Relate the news of Abraham to them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When he asked his father and his people: "What do you worship?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They replied: "We worship idols and are devoted to them."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Abraham) asked: "Do they hear when you call them?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Or do they benefit you, or do you harm?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "No. But we found our fathers doing so."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "Have you considered what you have been worshipping,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You and your fathers?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet they are my enemies except the Lord of all the worlds

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who created me and showed me the way,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who gives me food and drink,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And heals me when I am sick,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who will make me die, then give me life again,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And who, I hope, will condone my faults on the Day of Judgement.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: O Lord, give me wisdom and admit me among the righteous,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And uphold my name with posterity,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And put me among the inheritors of Paradise.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Forgive me and my father: He was surely among those who went astray.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And do not disgrace me on the day when they are raised from the graves,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The day when neither wealth nor children will be of any avail

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But to him who comes to God with a tranquil heart."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Paradise will be brought near those who take heed for themselves and follow the straight path;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And Hell made visible to those who had gone astray.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will be asked: "Where are those you worshipped

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Other than God? Can they save you or even save themselves?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will then be thrown into Hell with those who had gone astray

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Together with the hordes of Iblis.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Disputing among themselves they will say:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "By God, we were plainly in error

name: Ahmed Ali
text: In equating you with the Lord of all the worlds;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: No one but the sinners led us astray.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Now we have none to intercede for us,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Nor any sincere friend.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If only we could return and be among the believers!"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily there is a sign in this, but many of them do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily your Lord is mighty and merciful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The people of Noah accused the apostles of lies.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When their brother Noah said to them: "Will you not take heed?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I have been sent as a trusted messenger to you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So be fearful of God and listen to me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I ask no recompense of you for it. My reward is due from none but the Lord of all the worlds.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So fear God and follow me."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "Should we place our trust in you when only the condemned follow you?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "It is not for me to know what they were doing.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It is for my Lord to bring them to book, if you can understand.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I am certainly not one to drive away the believers.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I am only a plain admonisher."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will be stoned to death."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He prayed: "O Lord, verily my people accuse me of lies.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So adjudge between me and them conclusively, and save me and the believers who are with me."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We delivered him and those with him in the loaded ark,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And drowned the rest of them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily there is a sign in this, yet many of them do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But surely your Lord is mighty and merciful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The people of 'Ad accused the messengers of lies.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When their brother Hud said to them: "Will you not take heed?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I have been sent as a trusted messenger to you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So fear God and listen to me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I ask no recompense of you for it. My reward is due from none but the Lord of all the worlds.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You construct monuments on every hill in vain,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Erect palaces (thinking) that you will live for ever,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And whenever you apply force become tyrannical.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So be fearful of God and follow me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Fear Him who has bestowed on you what you know,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Gave you increase of cattle and sons,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And orchards and springs.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I fear the punishment of a terrible day for you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "It is the same to us if you warn us or do not warn.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is just a habit of antiquated people.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We are not going to be damned."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then they accused him of lies; so We annihilated them. Verily there is a sign in this, but most of them do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet surely your Lord is mighty and merciful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The Thamud accused the messengers of lies.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When their brother Saleh said to them: "Will you not take heed?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I have been sent as a trusted messenger to you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So fear God and follow me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I do not ask any recompense of you for this. My reward is due from none but the Lord of all the worlds.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Do you think) you will be left secure here

name: Ahmed Ali
text: In these gardens and these springs,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The fields of corn and date-palm trees with soft and tender spathes,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And dwellings hewed out of mountains ingeniously?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So be mindful of God and listen to me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do not follow those who are extravagant,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who corrupt the land and do not reform it."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "Surely you are deluded.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You are nothing but a man like us. Bring us a token if you speak the truth."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Saleh) said: "Here is a she-camel. She has a right of drinking water, and you have a right of drinking it on appointed turns.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do not treat her unkindly or the punishment of a grievous day will fall on you."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But they hamstrung her; and on the morrow were repentant,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: For they were seized by the torment. Verily there was a sign in this, but most of them did not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet verily your Lord is mighty and merciful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The people of Lot accused the messengers of lies.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When their brother Lot said to them: "Will you not take heed?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I have been sent as a trusted messenger to you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So fear God and listen to me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I ask no recompense of you for this. My reward is due from none but the Lord of all the worlds.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Why do you go for males unlike all other creatures

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Leaving the consorts your Lord has made for you? But you are a people who exceed the bounds."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will be expelled (from the city)."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Lot) said: "I am disgusted with your actions,"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (And prayed:) "O Lord, save me and my family from what they do."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We saved him and his whole family

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except one old woman who remained behind.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then We destroyed the rest of them,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And rained on them a shower (of Stones). How terrible was the rain (that fell) on those who had been warned!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily in this was a sign, but most of them do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet surely your Lord is mighty and powerful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The people of the Wood too called the messengers liars.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When Shu'aib said to them: "Will you not take heed?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I have been sent as a trusted messenger to you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So fear God and follow me.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I ask no recompense of you for this. My reward is due from none but the Lord of all the worlds.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Give full measure and do not cheat;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Weigh on an even balance.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And do not withhold from people what belongs to them, and do not corrupt the land;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And fear Him who created you and all the earlier people."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They said: "Surely you are deluded.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You are nothing but a man like us, and we think you are a liar.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But in case you are speaking the truth, then make a segment of the sky to fall upon us."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Shu'aib) said: "My Lord knows well what you are doing."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But they denied him, and We seized them with the torment of the Day of Shadowing (when the cloud had rained down fire). It was indeed the torment of a terrible day!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Verily in this was a sign, but most of them do not believe.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Yet verily your Lord is mighty and merciful.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And this (Qur'an) is a revelation from the Lord of all the worlds,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Which the trusted spirit descended with

name: Ahmed Ali
text: To (communicate) to your heart that you may be a warner

name: Ahmed Ali
text: In eloquent Arabic.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is (indicated) in the Books of earlier people.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Was it not a proof for them that the learned men of Israel knew about this?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Had We revealed it to a man of obscure tongue

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And he had recited it to them, and they had not believed (it would have been different).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Thus do We cause (unbelief) to enter the hearts of sinners.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will not believe it until they behold the painful punishment.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It will come upon them unawares, and they will not comprehend it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then will they say: "Can we be given respite?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do they wish Us then to hasten the punishment?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Just think: If We let them enjoy (the good things of life) for a few years more,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And then what they were promised comes upon them,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Of what avail shall their enjoyment be to them?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Never have We destroyed a habitation till We had sent admonishers to them

name: Ahmed Ali
text: To warn. For We are never unjust.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The devils did not bring it down:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They are not worthy of it, nor have they power.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They have been precluded from hearing it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So call on no other god but God, lest you are condemned to torment;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And warn your near relations,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And take those believers under your wing who follow you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If they do not obey you, tell them: "I am not responsible for what you do."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Have trust in the Mighty, the Merciful,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who watches you when you get up,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And your movements among those who bow in homage to God.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He is all-hearing and all-knowing.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Should I tell you on whom the devils descend?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They come down to every mendacious sinner,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who listens to you (for spreading rumours); but most of them are liars.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: As for the poets, only those who go astray follow them.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Have you not seen that they wander distract in every valley,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And they say what they do not do,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except those who believe and do the right, and remember God a great deal, who retaliate only when they have been wronged. Yet the oppressors will now come to know through what reversals they will be overthrown!
